channel.title: Help please
channel.description: How do i make pking to where ucan only atk ppl ur lvl unless u go deeper?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I haven’t done private servers in a loooong time, so I’ll do my best to describe it otherwise.

Make sure you already have a wildy level, if not, declare one. Then, if(inwildy = true){ if(combatlevel - wildylevel <= otherperson){ canattackorwhatever = true; }else{ sendMessage("You need to move deeper into the wilderness!"); } }Something along those lines. Put that under the attacking void.

Hope I helped, most likely I didn’t!

~Lin

Read full topic
